thread.title: Audrey Lee Jacobs
thread.title_full: ZipRecruiter reviewed by Audrey Lee Jacobs

author: Audrey Lee Jacobs
title: Audrey Lee Jacobs
text: Desirea was very pleasant, knowledgeable and efficient. I had a bad experience with Indeed.com just now and Desirea was able to answer my questions and connect me to Ziprecruiter right away. She got a representative on the telephone with me before she finished her chat with me. She understood my q's and answered them fully and quickly. Yay, Desirea. And, Yay Ziprecruiter.
